2 Days

Kyoto Tradition & Pride

A romantic journey through Kyoto's temples with a traditional wedding photo session.

※ This is a sample tour. Please contact us for detailed information and customization options.

Overview

Experience the timeless beauty of Kyoto with a focus on tradition and romance. Visit stunning temples, participate in traditional ceremonies, and capture your love story with a professional wedding photo session in authentic Japanese settings.

Gallery

Sample Schedule

Day 1 - 09:00
Temple tour (Fushimi Inari, Kiyomizu-dera)
Day 1 - 14:00
Traditional lunch and tea ceremony
Day 1 - 16:00
Wedding photo session
Day 1 - 18:00
Check-in at ryokan
Day 2 - 10:00
Arashiyama bamboo forest visit
Day 2 - 14:00
Departure

Locations & Sample Experiences

Fushimi Inari & Kiyomizu-dera

Kyoto's most iconic temples with stunning architecture and spiritual significance

  • Private temple tours with LGBTQ+ friendly guides
  • Traditional architecture and history exploration
  • Spiritual and cultural immersion

Traditional Ryokan

Authentic Japanese inn experience with traditional hospitality

  • Stay at a traditional ryokan (1 night)
  • Traditional Japanese meals (kaiseki)
  • Onsen experience (if available)

Wedding Photo Session

Professional photography in authentic Japanese settings

  • Traditional Japanese wedding photo session
  • Kimono rental and styling
  • Professional photography service

Arashiyama Bamboo Forest

One of Kyoto's most beautiful natural landmarks

  • Bamboo forest walk
  • Nature photography
  • Peaceful meditation experience

Inquiry

For more information about this tour or to make a reservation, please contact us. We'll be happy to customize the itinerary to match your preferences and needs.
